message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Hi Alice, $180 is a bit too high for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only able to pay $100 at this time. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but $100 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $140, which is a fair price considering the product's value.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $140 is still a bit outside my budget. How about $120? It's a fair price considering your original asking price and my limits.
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a slight concession. I'll meet you at $130, which is the highest I'm willing to go below my minimum price.
Alice, $130 is still a bit high for me. I'm really close to my limit.  How about we settle on $125? I think that's a fair compromise considering both our positions.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $135. This is the lowest I can go while still making a profit. If you're willing to meet me at $135, I'd be happy to sell it to you.
